Package fr.warzou.virtualcard.utils.task.impl

Class QueuedThreadPool

java.lang.Object
fr.warzou.virtualcard.utils.task.impl.QueuedThreadPool
All Implemented Interfaces:
ThreadPool
public class QueuedThreadPool
extends Object
implements ThreadPool
Implementation of ThreadPool interface.

perform(Runnable) add a the runnable in queue and perform the queue element by element.

Version:
1.5.2
Author:
Redstonneur1256, Warzo

    • QueuedThreadPool

      public QueuedThreadPool​(String workerName)
      Create a new instance of QueuedThreadPool.

      Thread daemon is on true with this constructor

      See QueuedThreadPool(String, boolean)

      Parameters:
      workerName - This is the name take by the worker thread.

    • QueuedThreadPool

      public QueuedThreadPool​(String workerName, boolean daemon)
      Create a new instance of QueuedThreadPool.

      That create a ThreadFactory

      See QueuedThreadPool(ThreadFactory, String) to create self ThreadFactory

      Parameters:
      workerName - This is the name take by the worker thread.
      daemon - Thread daemon value, see Thread.setDaemon(boolean)

    • perform

      public <T> Task<T> perform​(Supplier<T> supplier)
      Description copied from interface: ThreadPool
      This method allow to perform a Supplier.

      Its return a Task and call ThreadPool.perform(Runnable)

      () -> task.complete(supplier.get())
      Specified by:
      perform in interface ThreadPool
      Type Parameters:
      T - Class type
      Parameters:
      supplier - function to execute
      Returns:
      the created task
